description.para: Interface to emulated sensor of real world devices (e.g. battery, heart rate monitor, blood pressure sensor, etc.)

briefdescription.para: Read the battery level. The battery level value returned in pLevel is the percentage of remaining battery capacity (0-100%).
Set the battery level, for test purposes.
Perform a heart rate measurement. Return the heart rate along with any RR interval data.
Set the heart rate, for test purposes.
Perform a blood pressure measurement. Return the measurement data.

parameterdescription.para: true if this is an intermediate measurement.

briefdescription.para: Perform a weight scale measurement. Return the measurement data.
Perform a temperature measurement. Return the measurement data.

parameterdescription.para: true if this is an intermediate measurement.

briefdescription.para: Perform a pulse oximeter spot check measurement.
